topic.title: Single source introduction
topic.shortdesc: This repo is dedicated to using single source documentation principles with GitHub. The pages here are for modeling and experimenting with content reuse.

data.name: description
data.value: This is a repository for a single source prototype.

body.p: Our organization doesn't use a component content management system. GitHub is used not just for publishing but for content development. The general idea is "Docs as Code". That means that documentation is treated the same way code is treated. Howerver, Markdown is not code. It is just markup for text which is then transformed into HTML.
